ability.name: Cold Reading
ability.description: * You may play a card on Cold Reading at any time: when you do: * Choose two of Strong, Fast, Lucky, Charming, and Clever: * Palm Reading acts as if you **also** had these traits. * However, if you draw The Tower or The Moon, take 1 Corruption Point. * You may discard the card on Cold Reading at any time. This cancels the above effect.
